title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.6 - Preemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.6 - Preemption

State Regulations

Except where the department has approved a local law or
ordinance as provided in section 1.7 of this Part, any local law or ordinance
which is inconsistent with any provision of this Part or of Part 597 of this

Title is preempted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
598-1.6

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
